apprentices_notes.name: Apprentice's Notes
apprentices_notes.desc: Notes left behind by a top student. Many useful spells are listed, and the handwriting is beautiful.

beginners_protector.name: Beginner's Protector
beginners_protector.desc: A polearm as straight as a flag pole. Well suited to most combat situations, it has an imposing presence when swung.

dull_blade.name: Dull Blade
dull_blade.desc: Youthful dreams and the thrill of adventure. If this isn't enough, then make it up with valiance.

hunters_bow.name: Hunter's Bow
hunters_bow.desc: A hunter's music consists of but two sounds: the twang of the bowstring and the whoosh of soaring arrows.

waster_greatsword.name: Waster Greatsword
waster_greatsword.desc: A sturdy sheet of iron that may be powerful enough to break apart mountains if wielded with enough willpower.

iron_point.name: Iron Point
iron_point.desc: Sharp and pointy at one end, it is a balanced weapon that is quite popular among travelers.

old_mercs_pal.name: Old Merc's Pal
old_mercs_pal.desc: A battle-tested greatsword that has seen better days and worse.

pocket_grimoire.name: Pocket Grimoire
pocket_grimoire.desc: A carefully compiled notebook featuring the essentials needed to pass a magic exam.

seasoned_hunters_bow.name: Seasoned Hunter's Bow
seasoned_hunters_bow.desc: A bow that has been well-polished by time and meticulously cared for by its owner. It feels almost like an extension of the archer's arm.

silver_sword.name: Silver Sword
silver_sword.desc: A sword for exorcising demons. Everyone knows it's made of a silver alloy, not pure silver.

black_tassel.name: Black Tassel
black_tassel.desc: An exceptionally powerful polearm that also offers a simple but elegant solution to the issue of the easily stained white tassel.

bloodtainted_greatsword.name: Bloodtainted Greatsword
bloodtainted_greatsword.desc: A steel sword that is said to have been coated with dragon blood, rendering it invulnerable to damage. This effect is not extended to its wielder, however.

cool_steel.name: Cool Steel
cool_steel.desc: A reliable steel-forged weapon that serves as a testament to the great adventures of its old master.

dark_iron_sword.name: Dark Iron Sword
dark_iron_sword.desc: A perfectly ordinary iron sword, just slightly darker than most.

debate_club.name: Debate Club
debate_club.desc: A handy club made of fine steel. The most persuasive line of reasoning in any debater's arsenal.

emerald_orb.name: Emerald Orb
emerald_orb.desc: A catalyst carved out of the hard jade from Jueyun Karst north of Liyue. Small, light, and durable, it is known more colloquially as the "jade ball."

ferrous_shadow.name: Ferrous Shadow
ferrous_shadow.desc: A replica of the famed sword of Arundolyn, the Lion of Light. Feel the power of a legendary hero as you hold this sword in your hand! Imagine yourself as the great warrior himself! Note: Daydreaming not recommended in live combat.

fillet_blade.name: Fillet Blade
fillet_blade.desc: A sharp filleting knife. The blade is long, thin, and incredibly sharp.

halberd.name: Halberd
halberd.desc: A polearm with an axe blade mounted on top that can deal quite a lot of damage. It's favored by the Millelith officers.

harbinger_of_dawn.name: Harbinger of Dawn
harbinger_of_dawn.desc: A sword that once shone like the sun. The wielder of this sword will be blessed with a "feel-good" buff. The reflective material on the blade has long worn off.

magic_guide.name: Magic Guide
magic_guide.desc: Version 12. A reprint featuring corrections to Version 11 and brand-new additions based on recent developments.

messenger.name: Messenger
messenger.desc: A basic wooden bow. It is said to have once been used as a tool for long-distance communication.

otherworldly_story.name: Otherworldly Story
otherworldly_story.desc: A cheap fantasy novel with no value whatsoever. Any claim that it possesses the power of catalysis is also pure fantasy.

raven_bow.name: Raven Bow
raven_bow.desc: Ravens are known to be the ferrymen of the dead. This bow's limb is decorated with raven feathers, which forebode the imminent death of its target.

recurve_bow.name: Recurve Bow
recurve_bow.desc: It is said that this bow can shoot down eagles in flight, but ultimately how true that is depends on the skill of the archer.

sharpshooters_oath.name: Sharpshooter's Oath
sharpshooters_oath.desc: This superior bow once belonged to a master archer. However, it gives off a strong scent, thus making it unsuitable for hunting.

skyrider_greatsword.name: Skyrider Greatsword
skyrider_greatsword.desc: A reliable steel sword. The legendary Skyrider once tried to ride it as a flying sword... for the second time.

skyrider_sword.name: Skyrider Sword
skyrider_sword.desc: A reliable steel sword. The legendary Skyrider once tried to ride it as a flying sword...

slingshot.name: Slingshot
slingshot.desc: A bow, despite the name. After countless experiments and improvements to the design, the creator of the ultimate slingshot found himself to have made what was actually a bow.

thrilling_tales_of_dragon_slayers.name: Thrilling Tales of Dragon Slayers
thrilling_tales_of_dragon_slayers.desc: A fictional story of a band of five heroes who go off on a dragon hunt. It is poorly written and structurally incoherent. Its value lies in the many lessons that can be learned from failure.

travelers_handy_sword.name: Traveler's Handy Sword
travelers_handy_sword.desc: A handy steel sword which contains scissors, a magnifying glass, tinder, and other useful items in its sheath.

twin_nephrite.name: Twin Nephrite
twin_nephrite.desc: A jade pendant formed by piecing together two jade stones.

white_iron_greatsword.name: White Iron Greatsword
white_iron_greatsword.desc: A claymore made from white iron. Lightweight without compromising on power. Effective even when wielded by one of average strength, it is extremely deadly in the hands of a physically stronger wielder.

white_tassel.name: White Tassel
white_tassel.desc: A standard-issue weapon of the Millelith soldiers. It has a sturdy shaft and sharp spearhead. It's a reliable weapon.

akuoumaru.name: Akuoumaru
akuoumaru.desc: The beloved sword of the legendary "Akuou." The blade is huge and majestic, but is surprisingly easy to wield.

alley_hunter.name: Alley Hunter
alley_hunter.desc: An intricate, opulent longbow. It once belonged to a gentleman thief who was never caught.

amenoma_kageuchi.name: Amenoma Kageuchi
amenoma_kageuchi.desc: A blade custom made for a famed samurai who could strike down a tengu warrior, known for their incredible agility, in midair.

blackcliff_agate.name: Blackcliff Agate
blackcliff_agate.desc: A mysterious catalyst made of a material known as "blackcliff." It has an ominous crimson glow that seems to pulse in synchronization with the tremors from deep within the earth.

blackcliff_longsword.name: Blackcliff Longsword
blackcliff_longsword.desc: A sword made of a material known as "blackcliff." It has a dark crimson glow on its black blade.

blackcliff_pole.name: Blackcliff Pole
blackcliff_pole.desc: A weapon made of blackcliff and aerosiderite. There is a dark crimson glow on its cold black sheen.

blackcliff_slasher.name: Blackcliff Slasher
blackcliff_slasher.desc: An extremely sturdy greatsword from the Blackcliff Forge. It has a dark crimson color from the blade to pommel.

blackcliff_warbow.name: Blackcliff Warbow
blackcliff_warbow.desc: A bow made of blackcliff that features extremely sturdy bow limbs. It requires an archer with a strong bow arm to use.

cinnabar_spindle.name: Cinnabar Spindle
cinnabar_spindle.desc: A sword made from materials that do not belong in this world. The power within might even be able to withstand the corruption of a venom that could corrode a mighty dragon.

compound_bow.name: Compound Bow
compound_bow.desc: An exotic metallic bow from a distant land. Though extremely difficult to maintain, it is easy to nock and fires with tremendous force.

crescent_pike.name: Crescent Pike
crescent_pike.desc: An exotic weapon with an extremely long blade on the top and a crescent blade at the bottom. It found its way into Liyue through foreign traders. With practice, it can deal heavy damage.

deathmatch.name: Deathmatch
deathmatch.desc: A sharp crimson polearm that was once a gladiator's priceless treasure. Its awl has been stained by the blood of countless beasts and men.

dodoco_tales.name: Dodoco Tales
dodoco_tales.desc:
A children's book filled with childish short stories at which one cannot help but laugh.
Even those readers who have long reached adulthood cannot help but be absorbed by the innocent, naive little adventures portrayed within.

dragons_bane.name: Dragon's Bane
dragons_bane.desc: A polearm decorated with an entwining golden dragon. Light and sharp, this weapon may very well kill dragons with ease.

dragonspine_spear.name: Dragonspine Spear
dragonspine_spear.desc: A spear created from the fang of a dragon. It is oddly warm to the touch.

end_of_the_line.name: End of the Line
end_of_the_line.desc: This seems to be a now-extinct fish. Its body is sufficiently elastic that a string may be attached to it to let it serve as a bow.

eye_of_perception.name: Eye of Perception
eye_of_perception.desc: A dim black glaze pearl that is said to have the power to read the purity of one's heart.

fading_twilight.name: Fading Twilight
fading_twilight.desc: A precious bow made of platinum, inlaid with an orb that shimmers with the light of eventide.

favonius_codex.name: Favonius Codex
favonius_codex.desc: A secret tome that belonged to the scholars of the Knights of Favonius. It describes the logic and power of elements and matter.

favonius_greatsword.name: Favonius Greatsword
favonius_greatsword.desc: A heavy ceremonial sword of the Knights of Favonius. It channels elemental power easily and is highly destructive.

favonius_lance.name: Favonius Lance
favonius_lance.desc: A polearm made in the style of the Knights of Favonius. Its shaft is straight, and its tip flows lightly like the wind.

favonius_sword.name: Favonius Sword
favonius_sword.desc: A standard-issue longsword of the Knights of Favonius. When you're armed with this agile and sharp weapon, channeling the power of the elements has never been so easy!

favonius_warbow.name: Favonius Warbow
favonius_warbow.desc: A standard-issue recurve bow of the Knights of Favonius. Only the best archers can unleash its full potential.

festering_desire.name: Festering Desire
festering_desire.desc: A creepy straight sword that almost seems to yearn for life. It drips with a shriveling venom that could even corrupt a mighty dragon.

forest_regalia.name: Forest Regalia
forest_regalia.desc: A weapon you obtained from an Aranara tale. It has taken on the shape of a greatsword that shall cut down the foes of the forest.

frostbearer.name: Frostbearer
frostbearer.desc: A fruit that possesses a strange, frosty will. A faint sense of agony emanates from it.

fruit_of_fulfillment.name: Fruit of Fulfillment
fruit_of_fulfillment.desc: A fruit you obtained from an Aranara tale. It holds the potential to conquer any crisis.

hakushin_ring.name: Hakushin Ring
hakushin_ring.desc: A catalyst that carries the memory of the Kitsune Saiguu of ancient times. However, this device is but an impoverished vessel for the full breadth of her thought.

hamayumi.name: Hamayumi
hamayumi.desc: A certain shrine maiden once owned this warbow. It was made with surpassing skill, and is both intricate and sturdy.

iron_sting.name: Iron Sting
iron_sting.desc: An exotic long-bladed rapier that somehow found its way into Liyue via foreign traders. It is light, agile, and sharp.

kagotsurube_isshin.name: Kagotsurube Isshin
kagotsurube_isshin.desc: This famed blade was born in a nation to the far north. But in the name of "Isshin," it was stained with many a dark deed on its home-bound journey.

katsuragikiri_nagamasa.name: Katsuragikiri Nagamasa
katsuragikiri_nagamasa.desc: A blade that was once made in Tatarasuna. Heavy and tough.

kings_squire.name: King's Squire
kings_squire.desc: A weapon you obtained from an Aranara tale. It has taken on the shape of a bow that can shoot the enemies of the forest down.

kitain_cross_spear.name: Kitain Cross Spear
kitain_cross_spear.desc: A special lance that was once used by a famed warrior who guarded the Tatarigami on Yashiori Island.

lions_roar.name: Lion's Roar
lions_roar.desc: A sharp blade with extravagant carvings that somehow does not compromise on durability and sharpness. It roars like a lion as it cuts through the air.

lithic_blade.name: Lithic Blade
lithic_blade.desc: A greatsword carved and chiseled from the very bedrock of Liyue.

lithic_spear.name: Lithic Spear
lithic_spear.desc: A spear forged from the rocks of the Guyun Stone Forest. Its hardness knows no equal.

luxurious_sea_lord.name: Luxurious Sea-Lord
luxurious_sea_lord.desc: The great king of the ocean. Having been air-dried, it makes for a fine weapon as well as emergency sustenance.

makhaira_aquamarine.name: Makhaira Aquamarine
makhaira_aquamarine.desc: An ancient greatsword that gleams like the waters themselves. A thousand years of sand erosion has not dulled its unnaturally sharp edge one bit.

mappa_mare.name: Mappa Mare
mappa_mare.desc: A nautical chart featuring nearby currents and climates that somehow found its way into Liyue via foreign traders.

missive_windspear.name: Missive Windspear
missive_windspear.desc: A beacon that shows the direction of the wind. Not every idyll carried on the breeze remains a gentle thing...

mitternachts_waltz.name: Mitternachts Waltz
mitternachts_waltz.desc: A bow painted the color of transgression and nights of illusion.

moonpiercer.name: Moonpiercer
moonpiercer.desc: A weapon you obtained from an Aranara tale. It is shaped like a giant arrow and can be used as a spear.

mouuns_moon.name: Mouun's Moon
mouuns_moon.desc: A lovely warbow made from seashells and coral. A mournful brilliance flows along its moonlight-colored arms.

oathsworn_eye.name: Oathsworn Eye
oathsworn_eye.desc: A national treasure of Byakuyakoku stored in the Dainichi Mikoshi. With the coming of the Serpent God, this item was used to notarize great oaths and wishes.

predator.name: Predator
predator.desc: A uniquely-designed bow. This should not belong in this world.

prototype_amber.name: Prototype Amber
prototype_amber.desc: A dully gilded catalyst secretly guarded in the Blackcliff Forge. It seems to glow with the very light from the sky.

prototype_archaic.name: Prototype Archaic
prototype_archaic.desc: An ancient greatsword discovered in the Blackcliff Forge. It swings with such an immense force that one feels it could cut straight through reality itself.

prototype_crescent.name: Prototype Crescent
prototype_crescent.desc: A prototype longbow discovered in the Blackcliff Forge. The arrow fired from this bow glimmers like a ray of moonlight.

prototype_rancour.name: Prototype Rancour
prototype_rancour.desc: An ancient longsword discovered in the Blackcliff Forge that cuts through rocks like a hot knife through butter.

prototype_starglitter.name: Prototype Starglitter
prototype_starglitter.desc: A hooked spear discovered hidden away in the Blackcliff Forge. The glimmers along the sharp edge are like stars in the night.

rainslasher.name: Rainslasher
rainslasher.desc: A fluorescent greatsword with no sharp edge that crushes enemies with brute force and raw power.

royal_bow.name: Royal Bow
royal_bow.desc: An old longbow that belonged to the erstwhile aristocratic rulers of Mondstadt. Countless generations later, the bowstring is still tight and can still fire arrows with great force.

royal_greatsword.name: Royal Greatsword
royal_greatsword.desc: An old greatsword that belonged to the erstwhile rulers of Mondstadt. It is made from the finest-quality materials and has stood the test of time. A weapon for use by the nobility only.

royal_grimoire.name: Royal Grimoire
royal_grimoire.desc: A book that once belonged to a court mage of Mondstadt who served the nobility. It contains faithful and comprehensive historical accounts as well as magic spells.

royal_longsword.name: Royal Longsword
royal_longsword.desc: An old longsword that belonged to the erstwhile rulers of Mondstadt. Exquisitely crafted, the carvings and embellishments testify to the stature of its owner.

royal_spear.name: Royal Spear
royal_spear.desc: This polearm was once cherished by a member of the old nobility that governed Mondstadt long ago. Although it has never seen the light of day, it is still incomparably sharp.

rust.name: Rust
rust.desc: A completely rusted iron greatbow. The average person would lack the strength to even lift it, let alone fire it.

sacrificial_bow.name: Sacrificial Bow
sacrificial_bow.desc: A ceremonial hunting bow that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.

sacrificial_fragments.name: Sacrificial Fragments
sacrificial_fragments.desc: A weathered script, the text of which is no longer legible. A cursed item eroded by the winds of time.

sacrificial_greatsword.name: Sacrificial Greatsword
sacrificial_greatsword.desc: A ceremonial greatsword that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.

sacrificial_sword.name: Sacrificial Sword
sacrificial_sword.desc: A ceremonial sword that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.

sapwood_blade.name: Sapwood Blade
sapwood_blade.desc: A weapon you obtained from an Aranara tale. It has taken on the shape of a blade that can cut down the foes of the forest.

serpent_spine.name: Serpent Spine
serpent_spine.desc: A rare weapon whose origin is the ancient ocean. One can hear the sound of the ageless waves as one swings it.

snow_tombed_starsilver.name: Snow-Tombed Starsilver
snow_tombed_starsilver.desc: An ancient greatsword that was stored between frescoes. Forged from Starsilver, it has the power to cleave through ice and snow.

solar_pearl.name: Solar Pearl
solar_pearl.desc: A dull, golden pearl made of an unknown substance that harbors the light of the sun and the moon and pulses with a warm strength.

sword_of_descension.name: Sword of Descension
sword_of_descension.desc: A sword of unique craftsmanship. It does not appear to belong to this world.

the_alley_flash.name: The Alley Flash
the_alley_flash.desc: A straight sword as black as the night. It once belonged to a thief who roamed the benighted streets.

the_bell.name: The Bell
the_bell.desc: A heavy greatsword. A clock is embedded within it, though its internal mechanisms have long been damaged.

the_black_sword.name: The Black Sword
the_black_sword.desc: A pitch-black longsword that thirsts for violence and conflict. It is said that this weapon can cause its user to become drunk on the red wine of slaughter.

the_catch.name: "The Catch"
the_catch.desc: In the distant past, this was the beloved spear of a famed Inazuman bandit.

the_flute.name: The Flute
the_flute.desc: Beneath its rusty exterior is a lavishly decorated thin blade. It swings as swiftly as the wind.

the_stringless.name: The Stringless
the_stringless.desc: A bow that once served as an extraordinary instrument. It is no longer capable of getting people up and dancing.

the_viridescent_hunt.name: The Viridescent Hunt
the_viridescent_hunt.desc: A pure green hunting bow. This once belonged to a certain hunter whose home was the forest.

the_widsith.name: The Widsith
the_widsith.desc: A heavy notebook filled with musical scores. Though suffering from moth damage and heavy wear-and-tear, there is still much power to be found among the hand-written words within.

toukabou_shigure.name: Toukabou Shigure
toukabou_shigure.desc: A rather special oil-paper umbrella. While long wanderings may make one used to the wind and the rain, there might be some fun in admiring a rainy scene beneath this parasol.

wandering_evenstar.name: Wandering Evenstar
wandering_evenstar.desc: This was originally a device used by researchers to observe and perform calculations on celestial phenomena. It serves as a conduit and catalyst.

wavebreakers_fin.name: Wavebreaker's Fin
wavebreakers_fin.desc: A naginata forged from luminescent material deep in the ocean depths. It was once the possession of the tengu race.

whiteblind.name: Whiteblind
whiteblind.desc: An exotic sword with one section of the blade left blunt. It made its way into Liyue via the hands of foreign traders. Incredibly powerful in the hands of someone who knows how to use it.

windblume_ode.name: Windblume Ode
windblume_ode.desc: A bow adorned with nameless flowers that bears the earnest hopes of an equally nameless person.

wine_and_song.name: Wine and Song
wine_and_song.desc: A songbook from the bygone aristocratic era, whose composer has become forgotten. It chronicles the tale of a certain heroic outlaw.

xiphos_moonlight.name: Xiphos' Moonlight
xiphos_moonlight.desc: This ancient double-edged sword glimmers with moonlight. It is said that a now-silent Jinni dwells within it.

a_thousand_floating_dreams.name: A Thousand Floating Dreams
a_thousand_floating_dreams.desc: This lamp illuminates the dreams that float up over a thousand nights, and in its emerald-green light flows a song of ancient days.

amos_bow.name: Amos' Bow
amos_bow.desc: An extremely ancient bow that has retained its power despite its original master being long gone. It draws power from everyone and everything in the world, and the further away you are from that which your heart desires, the more powerful it is.

aqua_simulacra.name: Aqua Simulacra
aqua_simulacra.desc: This longbow's color is unpredictable. Under the light, it takes on a lustrous, watery blue.

aquila_favonia.name: Aquila Favonia
aquila_favonia.desc: The soul of the Knights of Favonius. Millennia later, it still calls on the winds of swift justice to vanquish all evil — just like the last heroine who wielded it.

calamity_queller.name: Calamity Queller
calamity_queller.desc: A keenly honed weapon forged from some strange crystal. Its faint blue light seems to whisper of countless matters now past.

elegy_for_the_end.name: Elegy for the End
elegy_for_the_end.desc: A bow as lovely as any bard's lyre, its arrows pierce the heart like a lamenting sigh.

engulfing_lightning.name: Engulfing Lightning
engulfing_lightning.desc: A naginata used to "cut grass." Any army that stands before this weapon will probably be likewise cut down...

everlasting_moonglow.name: Everlasting Moonglow
everlasting_moonglow.desc: A string of lovely jasper from the deep sea. It shines with a pure radiance like that of the moon, and just as ever-distant.

freedom_sworn.name: Freedom-Sworn
freedom_sworn.desc: A straight sword, azure as antediluvian song, and as keen as the oaths of freedom taken in the Land of Wind.

haran_geppaku_futsu.name: Haran Geppaku Futsu
haran_geppaku_futsu.desc: A famed work by the Futsu line of smiths. The name "Haran" comes from the manner in which it resembles the violent, roiling waves.

hunters_path.name: Hunter's Path
hunters_path.desc: This gilded bow was made using precious white branches. It has felled countless wicked beasts attempting to infiltrate the woods.

kaguras_verity.name: Kagura's Verity
kaguras_verity.desc: The bells used when performing the Kagura Dance, blessed by the Guuji herself. The scent of the Sacred Sakura tree lingers on it.

key_of_khajnisut.name: Key of Khaj-Nisut
key_of_khajnisut.desc: One of a paired set of scepters fashioned from obsidian. They say that this can be used as a key to open the gate to a paradise that lies at the end of the ocean of sand.

light_of_foliar_incision.name: Light of Foliar Incision
light_of_foliar_incision.desc: This gilded blade was made using precious white branches. It was once used to destroy countless poisons that infested the forest.

lost_prayer_to_the_sacred_winds.name: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds
lost_prayer_to_the_sacred_winds.desc: An educational tome written by anonymous early inhabitants who worshiped the wind. It has been blessed by the wind for its faithfulness and influence over the millennia.

memory_of_dust.name: Memory of Dust
memory_of_dust.desc: A stone dumbbell containing distant memories. Its endless transformations reveal the power within.

mistsplitter_reforged.name: Mistsplitter Reforged
mistsplitter_reforged.desc: A sword that blazes with a fierce violet light. The name "Reforged" comes from it having been broken once before.

polar_star.name: Polar Star
polar_star.desc: A pristine bow that is as sharp as the glaciers of the far north.

primordial_jade_cutter.name: Primordial Jade Cutter
primordial_jade_cutter.desc: A ceremonial sword masterfully carved from pure jade. There almost seems to be an audible sigh in the wind as it is swung.

primordial_jade_winged_spear.name: Primordial Jade Winged-Spear
primordial_jade_winged_spear.desc: A jade polearm made by the archons, capable of slaying ancient beasts.

redhorn_stonethresher.name: Redhorn Stonethresher
redhorn_stonethresher.desc: According to its previous owner, this weapon is the "Mighty Redhorn Stoic Stonethreshing Gilded Goldcrushing Lion Lord" that can send any monster packing with its tail between its legs.

skyward_atlas.name: Skyward Atlas
skyward_atlas.desc: A cloud atlas symbolizing Dvalin and his former master, the Anemo Archon. It details the winds and clouds of the northern regions and contains the powers of the sky and wind.

skyward_blade.name: Skyward Blade
skyward_blade.desc: The sword of a knight that symbolizes the restored honor of Dvalin. The blessings of the Anemo Archon rest on the fuller of the blade, imbuing the sword with the powers of the sky and the wind.

skyward_harp.name: Skyward Harp
skyward_harp.desc: A greatbow that symbolizes Dvalin's affiliation with the Anemo Archon. The sound of the bow firing is music to the Anemo Archon's ears. It contains the power of the sky and wind within.

skyward_pride.name: Skyward Pride
skyward_pride.desc: A claymore that symbolizes the pride of Dvalin soaring through the skies. When swung, it emits a deep hum as the full force of Dvalin's command of the sky and the wind is unleashed.

skyward_spine.name: Skyward Spine
skyward_spine.desc: A polearm that symbolizes Dvalin's firm resolve. The upright shaft of this weapon points towards the heavens, clad in the might of sky and wind.

song_of_broken_pines.name: Song of Broken Pines
song_of_broken_pines.desc: A greatsword as light as the sigh of grass in the breeze, yet as merciless to the corrupt as a typhoon.

staff_of_homa.name: Staff of Homa
staff_of_homa.desc: A "firewood staff" that was once used in ancient and long-lost rituals.

staff_of_the_scarlet_sands.name: Staff of the Scarlet Sands
staff_of_the_scarlet_sands.desc: One of a paired set of scepters fashioned from obsidian. Legend has it that these staves grant the right to lead the people of the desert, but no retainer now lives who can verify the proper appearance of these regalia.

summit_shaper.name: Summit Shaper
summit_shaper.desc: A symbol of a legendary pact, this sharp blade once cut off the peak of a mountain.

the_unforged.name: The Unforged
the_unforged.desc: Capable of driving away evil spirits and wicked people alike, this edgeless claymore seems to possess divine might.

thundering_pulse.name: Thundering Pulse
thundering_pulse.desc: A longbow that was a gift from the Shogun. Eternal lightning crackles all around it.

tulaytullahs_remembrance.name: Tulaytullah's Remembrance
tulaytullahs_remembrance.desc: A bell crafted of deep sapphire and sterling silver. Its echoes are as crisp as they are distant.

vortex_vanquisher.name: Vortex Vanquisher
vortex_vanquisher.desc: This sharp polearm can seemingly pierce through anything. When swung, one can almost see the rift it tears in the air.

wolfs_gravestone.name: Wolf's Gravestone
wolfs_gravestone.desc: A longsword used by the Wolf Knight. Originally just a heavy sheet of iron given to the knight by a blacksmith from the city, it became endowed with legendary power owing to his friendship with the wolves.
